purpleculture_pinyin:
jiǎn
to choose; to pick; to sort out; to pick up
выбирать; подобрать; разобраться; подобрать
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 拣)
Pictophonetic: 柬 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 揀選 [ jiǎn xuǎn ]: to select; to sort out
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 柬 [ jiǎn ] card, letter, invitation, note
heisig_chinese_memo: If you opt for traveling to an eastern country you will find yourself constantly surprised by the exotic culture and pointing your fingers at everything.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If I had to choose between gripping a rickshaw with my fingers and pulling it or driving a taxi, I would totally opt for the taxi.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " hand " to the sound of " cambo ". " Pick " is the differentiated word for " Cambodia ", which means to choose and choose. "Guang Ya. Shi Gu Yi: "Choose, choose." Such as "Yi Zhou Shu. "Five Competitions Don’t Choose", Kong Chao's note: "If you don’t choose, you don’t know what to choose." "Wu Yue Chun Qiu. "Helü Neizhuan": "In the last three months, I picked up the trainees, and then Wu." "Three Kingdoms. Wu Shu. "He Quan Lu Zhou Zhongli Biography": "Pick him as a soldier, second as a county household."

" Choose " by extension means picky. For example, Han Yu's "Gift to Zhang Ji" in the Tang Dynasty: "I love his character, and the beauty is beyond choice." Su Shi of the Northern Song Dynasty, "Bu Suanzi": "Choose all the cold branches and refuse to perch, the maple falls and Wujiang is cold."

" Pick " also means pick. For example, Chapter 6 of "The Heroes of the Sons and Daughters": "The bald man said, "Who threw this thing here? This must be done by three children. Let's bring him to the kitchen." He said, bending down. Pick that Xuanzi up." "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 73: "I picked Zhi'er and picked it up behind the mountain."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hand " to the sound of " cambo ". " Pick " is the differentiated word for " Cambodia ", which means to choose and choose.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「柬」聲。「揀」是「柬」的分化字，表示挑選、選擇。《廣雅．釋詁一》：「揀，擇也。」如《逸周書．酆保》「五比黨不揀」，孔晁注：「不揀，不知所擇也。」《吳越春秋．闔閭內傳》：「後三月，揀練士卒，遂之吳。」《三國志．吳書．賀全呂周鍾離傳》：「揀其精健為兵，次為縣戶。」

　　「揀」引申表示挑剔。如唐代韓愈〈贈張籍〉：「吾愛其風骨，粹美無可揀。」北宋蘇軾〈卜算子〉：「揀盡寒枝不肯棲，楓落吳江冷。」

　　「揀」又表示拾取。如《兒女英雄傳》第6回：「那禿子便說道：『誰把這東西扔在這兒咧？這准是三兒幹的，咱們給他帶到廚房裏去。』說着，彎下腰去揀那鏇子起來。」《紅樓夢》第73回：「我掏促織兒，在山子石後頭揀的。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「柬」聲。「揀」是「柬」的分化字，表示挑選、選擇。

揀選 [ jiǎn xuǎn ]: to select; to sort out
(Simplified: 拣)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 柬 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 6
Chinese: If you opt for traveling to an eastern country you will find yourself constantly surprised by the exotic culture and pointing your fingers at everything.
Meaning: opt for
Hanzi: 拣
Story: If I had to choose between gripping a rickshaw with my fingers and pulling it or driving a taxi, I would totally opt for the taxi.
Kind: traditional
從「 手 」，「 柬 」聲。「 揀 」是「 柬 」的分化字，表示挑選、選擇。《廣雅．釋詁一》：「揀，擇也。」如《逸周書．酆保》「五比黨不揀」，孔晁注：「不揀，不知所擇也。」《吳越春秋．闔閭內傳》：「後三月，揀練士卒，遂之吳。」《三國志．吳書．賀全呂周鍾離傳》：「揀其精健為兵，次為縣戶。」 「 揀 」引申表示挑剔。如唐代韓愈〈贈張籍〉：「吾愛其風骨，粹美無可揀。」北宋蘇軾〈卜算子〉：「揀盡寒枝不肯棲，楓落吳江冷。」 「 揀 」又表示拾取。如《兒女英雄傳》第6回：「那禿子便說道：『誰把這東西扔在這兒咧？這准是三兒幹的，咱們給他帶到廚房裏去。』說着，彎下腰去揀那鏇子起來。」《紅樓夢》第73回：「我掏促織兒，在山子石後頭揀的。」
From the " hand" to the sound of " cambo". " Pick" is the differentiated word for " Cambodia", which means to choose and choose. "Guang Ya. Shi Gu Yi: "Choose, choose." Such as "Yi Zhou Shu. "Five Competitions Don’t Choose", Kong Chao's note: "If you don’t choose, you don’t know what to choose." "Wu Yue Chun Qiu. "Helü Neizhuan": "In the last three months, I picked up the trainees, and then Wu." "Three Kingdoms. Wu Shu. "He Quan Lu Zhou Zhongli Biography": "Pick him as a soldier, second as a county household." " Choose" by extension means picky. For example, Han Yu's "Gift to Zhang Ji" in the Tang Dynasty: "I love his character, and the beauty is beyond choice." Su Shi of the Northern Song Dynasty, "Bu Suanzi": "Choose all the cold branches and refuse to perch, the maple falls and Wujiang is cold." " Pick" also means pick. For example, Chapter 6 of "The Heroes of the Sons and Daughters": "The bald man said, "Who threw this thing here? This must be done by three children. Let's bring him to the kitchen." He said, bending down. Pick that Xuanzi up." "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 73: "I picked Zhi'er and picked it up behind the mountain."

揀字的基本解释

揀
jiǎn
见“拣”。

揀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎn］
［《廣韻》古限切，上産，見。］
［《廣韻》郎甸切，去霰，來。］
“拣1”的繁体字。
(1)选择；挑选。
(2)引申指挑剔。
(3)拾取。

揀字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　揀； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页440第22
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?古限切，音?。與柬同。選也，擇也，分別之也。【魏志·袁紹傳】博愛容衆，無所揀擇。【逸周書】比黨不揀。【舊唐書·懿宗紀】邊方未靜，深藉人才，宜令徐泗團練使，選揀召募官健三千人，赴邕管防戍。　又汰揀。【張耒贈无咎詩】磨君古靑銅，汰揀寄明辨。通作?。　又郞甸切，音練。義同。或作㪝。

揀字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
揀字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hands and Words Department] 　 Pick; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 440 22
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】? Ancient limit cut, sound?. Same as Cambodia. Choose, choose, and separate. 【Wei Zhi·Yuan Shao Chuan】Human love and tolerance, no choice. [Book of Yi Zhou] Not picking it up than the party. [Old Tang Book·Yi Zong Ji] Bian Fang is not quiet, and borrowing talents deeply, it is advisable to make Xu Si Tuan to train, select and recruit 3,000 officials and Jian, to go to Yongguan for defense.　 Pick it up again. [Zhang Lei's Poem of No Blame] Grind the ancient bronze bronze, choose and send it clearly. Pass for?.　Cut again sharply and practice sound. The same meaning. Or as 㪝.
